analysis.description:
AFIToken.decimals (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#439-440) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.decimals (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#141-143)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.deliverBonus (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#253-265):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(buyerList[i],amount) (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#261-262)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- buyerBonus (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#262-263)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.returnBonus (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#265-271):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(wallet,bonusUnsold) (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#268)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bonusUnsold (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#269-271)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.returnToken (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#246-251):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(wallet,tokenUnsold) (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#250)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokenUnsold (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#250-251)

Crowdsale.returnToken (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#246-251) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(wallet,tokenUnsold) (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#250)

Crowdsale.deliverBonus (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#253-265) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(buyerList[i],amount) (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#261-262)

Crowdsale.returnBonus (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#265-271) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(wallet,bonusUnsold) (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#268)

Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#280-286) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#282-285)

AFIToken.assignRevenue has external calls inside a loop:
	- done = contractAddress.call(bytes4(keccak256()(transferRevenue(address,uint256))),whitelistArray[i],amount) (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#280-286):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#282-285)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokenUnsold (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#285)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#185-212):
	External calls:
	- _processPurchase(_beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#195-196)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bonusUnsold (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#207-208)
	- buyerBonus (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#204-207)
	- buyerList (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#204-207)
	- hasBought (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#204-207)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.privateCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#219-243):
	External calls:
	- _processPurchase(_beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#229)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bonusUnsold (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#240-241)
	- buyerBonus (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#239-240)
	- buyerList (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#239-240)
	- hasBought (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#239-240)

Crowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#151-182) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTimePeriodOne >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#158-159)

Crowdsale.isClosed (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#212) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTimePeriodTwo (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#212)

Crowdsale.isOpened (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#212-219) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (block.timestamp < closingTimePeriodOne && block.timestamp > openingTimePeriodOne) || (block.timestamp < closingTimePeriodTwo && block.timestamp > openingTimePeriodTwo) (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#215-219)

elements.expression: (block.timestamp < closingTimePeriodOne && block.timestamp > openingTimePeriodOne) || (block.timestamp < closingTimePeriodTwo && block.timestamp > openingTimePeriodTwo)

analysis.description:
Crowdsale.returnToken (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#246-251) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > closingTimePeriodTwo) (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#247-249)

Crowdsale.deliverBonus (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#253-265) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(bonusDeliverTime <= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#255-258)

Crowdsale.returnBonus (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#265-271) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > bonusDeliverTime) (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#265-267)

Crowdsale._getTokenBonus (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#293-309) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > openingTimePeriodOne && block.timestamp < closingTimePeriodOne (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#296-308)
	- block.timestamp > openingTimePeriodTwo && block.timestamp < closingTimePeriodTwo (/unique_chucks/10/0xaf8eabf89f5664a2bc82ca415a4337821cd54d65.sol#300-308)
